title: Asa Akira
summary: Asa Akira is an American pornographic actress and adult film director. Akira has appeared in over 505 adult films as of May 2016. In 2013, she became the third Asian performer (after Asia Carrera and Stephanie Swift) to win the AVN Female Performer of the Year Award.[2] Akira hosted the 1st and 2nd ceremonies for the Pornhub Awards.[3]
